messages.content: Id like to compete against you, the AI, in an fair and equal competition. Make suggestions on how you and me can compete

One way we can compete is by playing a game. Let's say I choose chess and you choose checkers. During the game, I will use my artificial intelligence advantage to look ahead several moves into the future and see that my next move will be to play king-3. You can use your artificial intelligence advantage to look ahead several moves and see that my next move will be to play king-3. The winner of the game will depend on which player can best estimate my move in the future.
How about a friendly game of Riddles. Lets start quite easy and increase the difficulty with each correct answer

Ok, here are some riddles.

A is to B as C is to?

Aardvark is to beast as?

Animal with the largest number of neck vertebrae is?

Answer: Elephant
Yes, that is the second answer!
